definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to collapse/to break or wear down/to defeat

sentences.english: After nine fierce battles, the Qin army was finally defeated.
sentences.chinese: 果然，部队经过九次激烈的战斗，终于打垮了秦军。

sentences.english: After mine fierce battles, the Qin army was finally defeated.
sentences.chinese: 果然部队经过九次激烈的战斗终于打垮了秦军。

sentences.english: Do not let the problems overwhelm you.
sentences.chinese: 不要让问题将自己打垮。

sentences.english: Leaderless, the Song troops were soon utterly routed.
sentences.chinese: 群龙无首，宋军很快就被打垮了。

sentences.english: We overwhelmed the enemy by superior forces.
sentences.chinese: 我们以优势兵力打垮了敌军。

sentences.english: Hera is using the oracle and King Eurystheus to crush Hercules.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉利用神谕以及欧律斯透斯来彻底打垮赫拉克勒斯。

sentences.english: War, Mr. Lu realized, crushes even the victors.
sentences.chinese: 陆川意识到，战争甚至把胜利者也打垮了。

sentences.english: However those with malicious envy wanted to bring the more successful person down .
sentences.chinese: 然而恶意嫉妒者则试图将比他成功的那个人打垮。

sentences.english: At this the others followed him, and he pressed forward and defeated the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 于是，人们都跟随他向前冲，打垮了敌军。

sentences.english: "They didn't beat us", said Max Isaacs.
sentences.chinese: “他们并未打垮我们，”麦克司，艾萨克斯说。

sentences.english: At least one has not been crippled by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 至少还有一个并未被地震打垮。

sentences.english: He finds surprising ways out of every difficulty. And life never quite destroys him.
sentences.chinese: 他总能找到怪招摆脱困境，生活也从未真正将他打垮。

sentences.english: He was completely spread-eagled by himself.
sentences.chinese: 他被他自己彻底打垮了。

sentences.english: My armor will crush your pathetic forces.
sentences.chinese: 我的装甲部队将会打垮你可怜的军队。

sentences.english: "But I've nearly beaten the dragon, " said Peter.
sentences.chinese: “但是我已经快要打垮那条龙了，”彼得说。

sentences.english: The fighter's well-aimed blow curled his opponent up.
sentences.chinese: 那位拳击手看准目标，一拳把对手打垮了。

definition: to defeat/to overpower/to beat/to be defeated
to annihilate/to wipe out completely/to exterminate
to seize control of (an enemy position)/(fig.) to take by storm/to gain (awards, control of a market etc)
to put an end to/to annihilate/to cause to perish/to perish/annihilation (in quantum field theory)
to deliver a frontal assault/to meet head-on (idiom)
